name: Kill Enemies And Ambush X
description:
Kill Enemies And Ambush X is a combination of all the commando and mission based games. Fight with the best armed forces with full of heavy weapons. You have to fight with courage and bravery and win the battle for your Country. Fight with best weapons and defeat all the enemies.

- Realistic Graphics
- 3D Environment that gives the real commando feeling
- First Person Shooting
- Excellent city Environment for military attack
- Realistic effects and new challenges to your mission.
- Easy and intuitive controls.
